abstract: Ford Motor Co reports third-quarter profit of $1.65 billion, or 41 cents per share, compared with profit of $1.69 billion, or 43 cents per share, in year-ago quarter; revenue was $33.1 billion, up 14 percent.
snippet: Earnings were down 2 percent from the period a year ago, but the automaker is on track to resume paying a dividend.
lead_paragraph: Earnings were down 2 percent from the period a year ago, but the automaker is on track to resume paying a dividend.

headline.main: Ford Motor Reports 10th Profitable Quarter, and May Restart Dividend
headline.print_headline: Ford Motor Reports 10th Profitable Quarter, And May Restart Dividend
